text: phir jab hamane us (sulaimaan) par maut ka nirnay kar diya, to jinnon ko unake maran par ek ghun ke siva kisee ne soochit nahin kiya, jo usakee chhadee kha raha tha.[1] phir jab vah gir gaya, to jinnon par ye baat khulee ki yadi ve paroksh ka gyaan rakhate, to is apamaanakaaree[2] yaatana mein nahin pade rahate
